name: Egypt Game Prototype
description:
This is a short puzzle game prototype where you, as the player, can shoot various blocks to move them. It involves some basic platforming, quick reflexes, and a lot of problem solving.

Please keep in mind this is not a finished project.

Controls:

  •  Basic Movement: WASD
  •  Aim: Mouse
  •  Push Block: Left Click
  •  Pull Block: Right Click
  •  Jump: Spacebar
  •  Cling to Platform: Shift

Credits:

  • Peter Eldredge: Lead Programmer, Designer, Sound Engineer, Lighting Engineer
  • Greg Langenhorst: Lead Artist, Designer, Composer, Effects Artist
  • Cody Lau: Menu Programmer, Designer, Effects Artist
  • Chris Rivera: Composer
